name: Black Jack Story
description: In the game, you act as a participant in a large card tournament "Golden Skull", held among the best players from all over the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Win 7/Win 8/Win 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Win 7/Win 8/Win 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics Storage: 1200 MB available space Sound Card: any
